entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is breathless and feels like he has left his insides back at Perkins's desk.

entities.name: auror cubicles
entities.description: The Auror cubicles are a location where people work. They are mentioned as being passed by Harry and Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: perkins’s desk
entities.description: Perkins's desk is a location where Harry left his insides. It is not clear what Perkins is or why Harry's insides are there.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a character in the story who is impatient and angry. He is trying to get to the courtrooms.

relationships.description: Harry passed by the Auror cubicles as he hurtled past them.
Mr. Weasley also passed by the Auror cubicles as they streaked past.
Harry left his insides at Perkins's desk.
Mr. Weasley skidded to a halt beside the lifts.
